headline.main: Michelle Obama Leads Campaign Against Obesity

docs.abstract: The first lady takes on an initiative to reduce the weight of young people.
docs.lead_paragraph: Michelle Obama kicked off a sweeping initiative today aimed at reshaping the diet and exercise habits of American children -- from the fat in their school lunches, to the playgrounds they frequent and the measurements their pediatricians take at check-up time -- with the ambitious goal of eliminating childhood obesity within a generation.
docs.snippet: The first lady takes on an initiative to reduce the weight of young people.

docs.abstract: The weather continues to wreak a little havoc in Washington.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Washington area now expects more snow later today and on Wednesday, complicating votes on Capitol Hill and canceling work for thousands of federal employees.
docs.snippet: The weather continues to wreak a little havoc in Washington.

headline.print_headline: A Federal Effort to Push Junk Food Out of Schools
headline.main: A Federal Effort to Push Junk Food Out of Schools

docs.lead_paragraph: To fight obesity, legislation would ban candy and sugary beverages, and many schools would be required to offer more nutritious fare.
docs.snippet: To fight obesity, legislation would ban candy and sugary beverages, and many schools would be required to offer more nutritious fare.
